channel.title: Mikescape317 - Unique Made Content - Regular Updates - Great Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/21j23q9.png[/img][/center] [center][url=http://www.mikescape.net]www.mikescape.net[/url][/center]
[FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=3][B][I]Mikescape [/I]has been around for over 4 years and is one of the best developed servers out there. With our great community and custom items we have been working our magic to create an amazing RSPS experience for all of you out there! Mikescape has multiple years of experience and is taken great care of thanks to the server owner and staff team. We are grateful for having the support from our great community which most of whom have been around for a very long time. Our staff team are really polite and always give the community the very best service and everybody is treated the same no matter who you are![/B]
[FONT=Arial Narrow][B][U][SIZE=5]Server[/SIZE][/U][/B] [SIZE=3] [ul][*]Stable Economy Server [*]700+ High Quality Customs [*]24/7 VPS Hosted 6GB [*]Absolutely NO LAG [*]Daily Updates[/ul]
[FONT=Arial Narrow][U][B][SIZE=5]Skilling[/SIZE][/B][/U] [SIZE=3] [ul][*]All Skills Working with a Choice of 21 to Choose From! [*]Custom Rewards System [*]Custom Maxed Capes For All 99's! [*]Customised Skilling Areas[/ul]
[U][B][SIZE=5]Minigames[/SIZE][/B][/U] [SIZE=3] [ul][*]Our Own Working Custom Zombie Minigame! [*]Fully Working PC [*]Fully Working Godwars [*]Our Own PKing Minigame 'Massacre'[/ul]
[U][B][SIZE=5]More Amazing Info[/SIZE][/B][/U] [SIZE=3] [ul][*]Automatic Donation System (Its QUICK!) [*]Each Month We Have Donation Special Offers Which Include Competitions and Free Items [*]15 Different Point/Rewards System [*]Perfect Switching [*]Full 5 Level Custom Achievements System (Easy, Medium, Hard, Extreme, Elite) [*]Awesome Custom Chat Crowns (Veteran, Helper, Donator, 3 Prestige, Owner, etc) [*]Full Prestige System with Chat Crowns, Yell Tags, Prestige Zone [*]Multiple Custom PvP Areas (Safe and Unsafe Zones) [*]Custom Player Panel (Kill/Death, My stats, Stats Highscores, Playtime, Last 10 Trades, etc) [*]Great Voting Rewards [*]Multiple Custom NPCS [B][FONT=Arial Black]Including Our Own Customised[/FONT] GOD![/B] [*]Full Highscores System [*]Custom Yell Tags for Different Ranks or Set by You [*]Great Pking and PvM [*]Turmoil Prayer [*][FONT=Arial Black][B]Our Own Gambling System![/B][/FONT] [*]Chaotics [*]Custom Corporeal Beast[/ul]
[FONT=Arial Narrow][B][U][SIZE=5]Staff Team[/SIZE][/U][/B] [SIZE=3][B]The most important thing for our staff is to take responsiblity of our players [B]SAFETY[/B], this ensures that players will have a great experience without receiving any abuse which is why we have our own system which allows us to constantly monitor the server. Mikescape staff are friendly and easy to approach. They take their job serious but do still enjoy having a laugh when the time is right.[/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=5][B][U]Media[/U][/B][/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0VOkBrF.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bDpU0CA.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8rLVCh4.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/t33lxuH.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kzQChX1.gif[/img] [B][FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=3]Fully Working Custom Minigame![/SIZE][/FONT][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YDCVwgx.png[/img] [B][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial Narrow]All Skills Working Including Total Level!![/FONT][/SIZE][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WudIg1V.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qqp1zg9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/12FldKf.png[/img]
Thanks for reading! Any questions? Just simply post below and I will do my best to get back to you :) [url=http://mikescape.net]mikescape.net[/url]

item.title: Mikescape317 - Unique Made Content - Regular Updates - Great Economy
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

completely junk.
i tried logging in.
cache wouldn’t install.
thinking i was iped, i changed my ip and mac address.
still nothing.
downloaded their shit “DeleteCache.bat”, ran it, nothing.
Rip.
shit server

item.title: Mikescape317 - Unique Made Content - Regular Updates - Great Economy
item.dc:creator: @ayeitswill ayeitswill
item.description:
@ayeitswill wrote:

[quote=“Mikescape317, post:39, topic:550360”]Updates

A few new items have been released in-game!
Events planned for Mikescapes 4th birthday
A few more commands have been added!
The 3rd age comp has ended! Congrats to our winner shaner300![/quote]

If you really enjoy a fresh server than Mikescape is for you. Really. We have almost restarted the economy and set up a beautiful new fun way to skill and accumulate wealth where you can not find anywhere else. We have amazing guides on our forums to help you out when you first start your adventure. Come enjoy the birth of a whole “new” server where you can really get in snug with the community within days. If you even need help you can ask for help from anyone or PM:Andradas (You have to do ::add (Playername)

Read full topic

@Mikescape317 wrote:

If you’re a custom lover, this server is for YOU! Cache 28 is almost done, that means a lot more customs are being added into the eco. We are having a crazy drop party Friday where one set of 3rd age (Rarest armor) will be given away in a competition to those who donate $10. Check us out you guys wont regret it if you’re a custom lover!

item.title: Mikescape317 - Unique Made Content - Regular Updates - Great Economy
item.dc:creator: @Davidwei0 Davidwei0
item.description:
@Davidwei0 wrote:

Try reverting back to a version of Java 7 or using Terminal to open the jar with a path to a java 7 version of java.exe.
Not too familiar with Mac, as I’ve never owned one, but heres how it would be done with windows:

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_51\bin\java.exe” -jar msclient.jar

Read full topic

item.title: Mikescape317 - Unique Made Content - Regular Updates - Great Economy
item.dc:creator: @Mikescape317 Mikescape317
item.description:
@Mikescape317 wrote:

Hey my bro thanks for that means alot!

Updates for March 12th
-Shop names have been updated.
-Coop zone added for prestige 3+. Great skilling area which includes all trees, zombies and more!
-PVP drops have been fixed!

Updates for 14th March
-Flying added for uber donators!
-Donatorzone has been upgraded.
-New guide with amazing information for money making.
-New commands which are easier to read!

Updates for 16th March
-New Rules (A lot have been removed)
-Previews of C28 are released. http://prntscr.com/6gv3tf - Vorago Claws
-Bank tabs working!

A lot more to come for Mikescape. We will be releasing lower level customs for all the custom fans, and hopefully adding a shop full of some customs for you all to buy which wont be too expensive .

Double EXP for St georges day! Best time to join for fast exp and easy prestiges!

Read full topic
item.source: Mikescape317 - Unique Made Content - Regular Updates - Great Economy

item.title: Mikescape317 - Unique Made Content - Regular Updates - Great Economy
item.dc:creator: @Mikescape317 Mikescape317
item.description:
@Mikescape317 wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:21, topic:550360”][quote author=Mikescape317 link=topic=669270.msg4476321#msg4476321 date=1426078829]
Hi, sorry that you got banned, it wasn’t by me, if you’re interested in playing again maybe we can get this sorted? The customs aren’t bad you dont need to hate if you aren’t a customs fan, you’re airing out an opinion which doesn’t affect me or anybody on the server. Your opinion is your opinion if it’s not nice could you keep it to yourself please?
[/quote]
ok, sorry.

also, my opinion(s) may seem to be disrespectful, but keep in mind they are only my opinions. you don’t have to agree with them, like you said we are all entitled to our own. but you own an rsps for christ sake, you must be aware that negative opinions will arise no matter what you do, and that’s just how it is. however, no matter how negative an opinion may be i don’t believe one should be banned over it. i know you weren’t the one behind the punishment, but you need to reevaluate your staff team.

i’ll give this server another shot, mostly because i’m bored. sorry for any disrespect though, even though it was unintentional.[/quote]

Thanks for getting back to us bro, I understand that and I am thankful you are giving us the time again to try us out. We have now sorted this issue in regards to you being banned as a staff member had followed the incorrect procedures and this was dealt with immediately.

Drop party at 5pm pst!

Read full topic
item.source: Mikescape317 - Unique Made Content - Regular Updates - Great Economy

item.title: Mikescape317 - Unique Made Content - Regular Updates - Great Economy
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Mikescape317:

Hi, sorry that you got banned, it wasn’t by me, if you’re interested in playing again maybe we can get this sorted? The customs aren’t bad you dont need to hate if you aren’t a customs fan, you’re airing out an opinion which doesn’t affect me or anybody on the server. Your opinion is your opinion if it’s not nice could you keep it to yourself please?

ok, sorry.

also, my opinion(s) may seem to be disrespectful, but keep in mind they are only my opinions. you don’t have to agree with them, like you said we are all entitled to our own. but you own an rsps for christ sake, you must be aware that negative opinions will arise no matter what you do, and that’s just how it is. however, no matter how negative an opinion may be i don’t believe one should be banned over it. i know you weren’t the one behind the punishment, but you need to reevaluate your staff team.

i’ll give this server another shot, mostly because i’m bored. sorry for any disrespect though, even though it was unintentional.

Read full topic
